ingredients: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into chunks
1 large red pepper, cut into match-like sticks
1 cup baby carrots, cut into match-like sticks
title: Asian Noodle Salad
instructions:
Place chicken in medium bowl. Add 1/4 cup of the marinade and the garlic; toss to coat. Refrigerate at least 20 minutes to marinate. Meanwhile, cook spaghetti in large saucepan as directed on package.
Mix dressing, remaining 1 tablespoon marinade and the ginger; set aside. Remove chicken from marinade mixture; discard marinade mixture. Stir-fry chicken, peppers and carrots in large nonstick skillet on medium heat 5 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Stir in dressing mixture.
Drain spaghetti; return to pan. Add chicken mixture and 3 tablespoons of the cilantro; mix lightly. Sprinkle with remaining 1 tablespoon cilantro.
